alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 14 at 12:19PM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor to moderate coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...Coastal Dixie County. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. Peak water levels are expected around the time of high tide early Sunday morning around 1 AM. * IMPACTS...Water levels will begin rising Saturday evening. Flooding of areas along the coast in Horseshoe Beach and Suwannee are possible. Water overtopping seawalls, impacting roads and non- elevated structures is possible.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
